summary: Brand name updated to "Nepal Top Up Center" in the header and browser/tab title, and a new Tailwind/CSS token-based theme (including dark mode variables) was introduced and applied across many screens. However, the diff introduces/contains new user-facing Nepali strings, which conflicts with the requirement that any newly introduced user-facing text be in English.

missing_requirements.requirement: Any newly introduced labels/help text are in English.
missing_requirements.reason: Multiple modified components include hard-coded Nepali user-facing strings (e.g., descriptions, helper copy, and toast error messages), indicating newly introduced text is not in English.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx ("प्रशासक उपकरणहरू र सेटिङहरू" and tab labels)
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx ("प्रतियोगितामा सामेल हुनुहोस् र पुरस्कार जित्नुहोस्!")
frontend/src/pages/TournamentsPage.tsx (Nepali descriptions and button text like "विवरण हेर्नुहोस्")

hallucinated_features.description: Added footer attribution/branding ("© 2026. Built with ... using caffeine.ai") and external link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-10/REQ-11; introduces additional branding/attribution content beyond updating the app name/theme.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced explicit image-based branding assets (logo and hero background) references.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-11 asks to adjust theme tokens/colors/typography; adding new generated image assets is not part of the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed SEO description meta tag content about wallet top-ups/withdrawals via IME Pay and Khalti.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 mentions browser tab title/metadata for the app name; adding new marketing copy beyond the name update is not explicitly requested.
